segments.text: Oh ! You're engaged ! What a beautiful engagement ring ! Who to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course Mike . Who else ? We fell in love at first sight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When's the wedding going to be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We haven't decided yet . There are a lot of things to sort out , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you having a big wedding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've always dream of having a big wedding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what do you say about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't really enjoy big occasions , but I think I â€™ ll come round to the idea in the end , It only happens once in a lifetime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps I'll agree with Mike . I couldn't stand a big wedding with many relatives and friends of my parents or my wife whom I'd never met before .
segments.speaker: S1
